chunk: Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Coconut (Cocos nucifera) Oil*, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Esters, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Apricot (Prunus armeniaca) Kernel Oil, Avocado (Persea gratissima) Oil, Sunflower (Helianthus annuus) Seed Oil, Sweet Almond (Prunus amygdalus dulcis) Oil, Citric Acid, Caprylhydroxamic

chunk: Xanthan Gum, Apricot (Prunus armeniaca) Kernel Oil, Avocado (Persea gratissima) Oil, Sunflower (Helianthus annuus) Seed Oil, Sweet Almond (Prunus amygdalus dulcis) Oil, Citric Acid, Caprylhydroxamic Acid.

chunk:
Directions: Apply liberally to face and body using circular motions.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
